attributes.action: Listen more to sensible members of the electorate rather than ill-informed advisers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think Gordon Brown, like all of us (if we are honest), has not achieved all his ambitions.  Becoming Prime Minister is a great achievement, but his has been a poisoned chalice, and somewhat of his own making.  He has but little time to turn this around, but he needs to be better advised.  There are many apolitical people in this land who only care for its success.  Support them, not the spin doctors.  The public are crying out for this, but they don't really want the moat-cleaning Tories in whatever form they take.

rejection.details: Please be more specifc about what action you are requesting the PM take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
